caption.p: Binding pattern of C. fistula major chemical constituents with the SMT of L. donovani. Two-dimensional (2D) plot, surface representation of protein binding pocket residues, and its significant interactions with (A) proanthocyanidin B dimer, (B) kaempferol rhamnosylxyloside, (C) myricetin hexoside, and (D) apigenin-6,8-di- C-glycoside.
